source.sqlReaderQuery:
DECLARE  @dstrct_code		VARCHAR(10)	='1001'
		DECLARE  @Expense_Element	VARCHAR(10) ='815000'


SELECT 
 '"Full Period"'=SUBSTRING(TXN.FULL_PERIOD, 1, 4) + '/' + SUBSTRING(TXN.FULL_PERIOD, 5, 2) ,
'"Transaction Date"'=FORMAT(CONVERT(datetime,cast(99999999-TRNDTE_REVSD as varchar)), 'dd-MMM-yyyy 00:00:00'), 
'"Account Code"'=TRIM(TXN.ACCOUNT_CODE),
'"Service Type"' = '' ,
'"Transaction Amount"'=TXN.[TRAN_AMOUNT],
'"Expense/Revenue"'= TRIM(TN.TABLE_DESC) ,
'"Tran Type"'=TRIM(TXN.[TRAN_TYPE]),
'"Work Order"' = TRIM(TXN.WORK_ORDER),
'"No of Hours"'=TXN.[NO_OF_HOURS],  
'"Stat Type"'=ISNULL(TRIM(TXN.[STAT_TYPE]),''),
'"STD Job No"'=ISNULL(TRIM(WO.STD_JOB_NO),''),
'"Project"'=isnull(TRIM(TXN.[PROJECT_NO]),'') ,
'"Project Description"'=isnull(TRIM(p.PROJ_DESC),''),
'"Creation Employee"'=Case when trim(TXN.[CREATION_USER] ) <> '' then  RIGHT('000000' +trim(TXN.[CREATION_USER]), 10) else '' end ,
'"Accountant"'=ISNULL(TRIM(TXN.ACCOUNTANT),''),
'"Employee Id"'=ISNULL(TRIM(TXN.EMPLOYEE_ID),'') ,
'"Employee Name"'=ISNULL(TRIM(EMP.FIRST_NAME) + ' ' + TRIM(EMP.SURNAME),'') ,
'"Employee Officer Code"'='',
'"Manual Journal Voucher"'=ISNULL(TRIM(TXN.MANJNL_VCHR),'') ,
'"Journal Header Description"'=ISNULL(CASE WHEN TRIM(m90a.JOURNAL_DESC_90A) IS NULL THEN TRIM(m917.JNL_DESC) ELSE TRIM(m90a.JOURNAL_DESC_90A)  END, ''),
'"Journal Line Description"'=ISNULL(CASE WHEN TRIM(m90b.JOURNAL_ITEM_DESC) IS NULL THEN TRIM(TXN.JOURNAL_DESC) ELSE TRIM(m90b.JOURNAL_ITEM_DESC) END, ''),        
'"Transaction No"'=ISNULL(TRIM(TXN.TRANSACTION_NO),'') ,
'"Invoice No"'=ISNULL(TRIM(TXN.EXT_INV_NO),'') ,
'"Purchase Order No"'=ISNULL(TRIM(TXN.PO_NO),''),
'"Supplier No"'=ISNULL(TRIM(TXN.SUPPLIER_NO),''),
'"Supplier Name"'=ISNULL(TRIM(SM.SUPPLIER_NAME),''),
'"Plant No"'=ISNULL(TRIM(EQ.PLANT_NO),'') ,
'"Item Name 1"'=ISNULL(TRIM(EQ.ITEM_NAME_1),'') ,
'"Equipment Location"'=ISNULL(TRIM(EQ.EQUIP_LOCATION),''),
'"WO Type"'= ISNULL(TRIM(WO.WO_TYPE),'')
	  
FROM Ellipse9.MSF900 TXN LEFT JOIN Ellipse9.MSF620 WO ON WO.ROW_NATURAL_KEY = @dstrct_code + '|' + TRIM(TXN.WORK_ORDER)
    				     LEFT JOIN Ellipse9.MSF600 EQ ON EQ.ROW_NATURAL_KEY =TRIM(TXN.EQUIP_NO)
						 LEFT JOIN Ellipse9.MSF200 SM ON SM.ROW_NATURAL_KEY =TRIM(TXN.SUPPLIER_NO)
						 LEFT JOIN Ellipse9.MSF90A m90a ON m90a.ROW_NATURAL_KEY = @dstrct_code + '|' + TRIM(TXN.MANJNL_VCHR)
						 LEFT JOIN Ellipse9.MSF90B m90b ON m90b.ROW_NATURAL_KEY = @dstrct_code + '|' + TRIM(TXN.MANJNL_VCHR) + '|' + TRIM(TXN.JNL_ITEM)
						 LEFT JOIN Ellipse9.MSF917 m917 ON m917.ROW_NATURAL_KEY = @dstrct_code + '|' + TRIM(TXN.MANJNL_VCHR)
						 LEFT JOIN Ellipse9.MSF810 EMP ON EMP.ROW_NATURAL_KEY =TRIM(TXN.EMPLOYEE_ID)
						 LEFT JOIN Ellipse9.MSF660 P ON P.ROW_NATURAL_KEY = @dstrct_code + '|' + TRIM(TXN.PROJECT_NO)
						 LEFT JOIN Ellipse9.MSF930 Q ON Q.ROW_NATURAL_KEY = @dstrct_code + '|' + SUBSTRING(TXN.ACCOUNT_CODE,9,6)
						 LEFT JOIN Ellipse9.MSF010 TN ON TN.ROW_NATURAL_KEY = Q.ACCT_CLASSIF_CODE +  '|FACC' 

WHERE
TXN.DSTRCT_CODE = @dstrct_code
AND SUBSTRING(TXN.ACCOUNT_CODE,9,6) =@Expense_Element 
AND Month(CONVERT(datetime,cast(99999999-TRNDTE_REVSD as varchar)))=Month([dbo].[udf_getLocalDTM]())
AND Year(CONVERT(datetime,cast(99999999-TRNDTE_REVSD as varchar)))=Year([dbo].[udf_getLocalDTM]())
ORDER BY CONVERT(datetime,cast(99999999-TRNDTE_REVSD as varchar))
